bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Qualifying Permanent Connectors Used in Substation Grounding
IEEE Standard for Qualifying Permanent Connectors Used in Substation Grounding

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard provides direction and methods for qualifying permanent connections used for substation grounding. It particularly addresses the connectors used within the grid system, connectors used to join ground leads to the grid system, and connectors used to join the ground leads to equipment and structures.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
